questions.questionText: Which of the following statement is correct for AngularJS?
On which of the Architectural pattern AngularJS is based?
questions.explanation: AngularJS is based on MVVM Architectural pattern.
AngularJS is perfect for Single Page Applications (SPAs).

questions.questionText: Which of the following is the correct syntax for writing AngularJS expressions?
questions.explanation: The correct syntax for writing AngularJS expressions is: {{expression}}

questions.questionText: Which of the following directive is used to bind the application data to the HTML view in AngularJS?
questions.explanation: The ng-bind directive is used to bind the application data to the HTML view in the AngularJS application.

questions.questionText: Which of the following syntax is correct for applying multiple filters in AngularJS?
questions.explanation: The syntax of applying multiple filters in AngularJS can be written as: {{ expression | filter1 | filter2 | ... }}

questions.questionText: Which of the following statement is true about the lowercase filter?

options.text: The lowercase filter converts a text to lower case text.
The lowercase filter is a function that takes text as input.

questions.explanation: The lowercase filter converts a text to lower case text. That's why it is added to the AngularJS expression to filter out the result.

questions.questionText: Which of the following is an advantage of AngularJS?

options.text: AngularJS uses dependency injection and makes use of separation of concerns.

questions.explanation: All of the above are the advantages of AngularJS.

questions.questionText: Which of the following statement is true about $dirty flag?

options.text: $dirty flag is used to state that value has been changed.
$dirty flag is used to state that the form has invalid data.

questions.explanation: The $dirty flag is used to state that value in the form has been changed.

questions.questionText: What is the use of Angular Controllers in the application?

options.text: Angular controllers are used for controlling the data.
Angular controllers are used for displaying the data.
Both of the above are correct.
None of the above is correct.

questions.explanation: Angular controllers are used to control the data.
